name: Halo Unreal Engine 4
description:
Halo Unreal engine © Microsoft Corporation. Halo Unreal engine was created under Microsoft's "Game Content Usage Rules" using assets from Halo, and it is not endorsed by or affiliated with Microsoft or 343 industries.

CONTROLS:
WASD: Walk
F: Melee
R: Reload
E: Pickup weapons
RMB: ADS / Zoom
CTRL: Crouch
SpaceBar: Jump
C: FlashLight / Drive Vehicles

FORGE CONTROLS:
Up Arrow Key to switch between Monitor/Player
X for items lists
Space to pickup / drop items
F to delete items
G to duplicate items
LMB to rotate Up/Down picked objects, RMB to rotate the object left/right (W/S to move object forward/backward while pressing LMB/RMB.)
(WORKS WITH STRUCTURES ONLY) Press B to change properties in real time

CREDITS:
spartan-0398: Concept arts/Artworks
TheMercifulGuard: Unfinished weapon models
AndyTheBear: Assault Rifle, Magnum models
AbiSV: Spartan model
Noe.Vah: Battle Rifle model
REVENGE: Some Sound effects
Sound effects are still W.I.P and place holders
